location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:134 x 118 mm, on sheet 232 x 153 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. S.D.O. No. 3944.Distinctive Features:Sketch map of Shumran bend on the Tigris River (the site of the Turkish Aerodrome) showing the movements of the British military forces on the 23rd February 1917 with the position of pontoon bridge and location of the Turkish Boat Bridges indicated.
